name: FORGET-ME-NOT (itch) (luzoko, Captain Turnip)
description:
Made for the Trans Game Dev Discord Birthday Jam 2022

An experimental mixed media action game where you cut someone out of your memories.


CONTROLS:

[A][D] or [Left Arrow][Right Arrow] - Move
[W] or [Up Arrow] - Jump
[J] or [Z] - Attack

CREDITS:

Captain Turnip - Art, Art Direction, Mixed Media Assets
luzoko - Programming, Animation
Chandani Desai - Mixed Media Actor

Music:
Osuten - White Noise

SFX from:
- Soniss GDC Audio Bundle
- OpenGameArt.org
- zapsplat.com
- gblanke
